214.title: Mad
notes:
American parody comic book and magazine.
        Beginning here are listed Library holdings of the magazine
        itself, and its various annuals and reprints. See below for

translations and foreign editions , and works about the magazine , as well as features that have their own lists in this index:
  • Bill (Chicken-Fat) Elder
  • Cloak and Dagger Dept.
  • Crime Dept.
  • Operation Under-the-Ground
  • Poetry Dept.
  • Report from Abroad
  • Snappy Answers to Stupid Questions
  • Spy vs. Spy
  • Star Blecch
  • Western Dept.
